enhanced_by.reason: basicWithImages method builds upon the configuration set by the basic method, adding additional tags and attributes.
Both basicWithImages and addTags methods modify the allowed tags in the Safelist.
Both basicWithImages and addAttributes methods modify the allowed attributes in the Safelist.
Both basicWithImages and addProtocols methods modify the allowed protocols in the Safelist.
After configuring the Safelist with basicWithImages, the isSafeTag method can be used to verify if a tag is allowed.
After configuring the Safelist with basicWithImages, the isSafeAttribute method can be used to verify if an attribute is allowed for a specific tag.
